channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Forerunner 165 : la montre running abordable de Garmin est à un prix encore plus bas pour le Singles Day
item.description: La Forerunner 165 de Garmin est une montre entrée de gamme, qui s'équipe d'un écran Amoled avec un tas de fonctionnalités de sport… Parfaite pour les débutants, la voilà en forte promotion à l'occasion du Singles Day d'AlIExpress : 146,94 euros au lieu de 279 euros de base.

item.title: The first Toy Story 5 teaser threatens the toys with a tablet
item.description: Disney and Pixar have released the first teaser trailer for Toy Story 5, showing tablet screens as an “all-new threat to playtime.” The trailer introduces — much to the horror of Woody and co — a new character called “Lilypad,” a frog-shaped tablet played by Greta Lee (Russian Doll, Tron: Ares), alongside the tagline “the […]

item.title: Fei-Fei Li’s World Labs speeds up the world model race with Marble, its first commercial product
item.description: Startups like Decart and Odyssey have released free demos, and Google's Genie is still in limited research preview. Marble differs from these — and even World Labs's own real-time model, RTFM — because it creates persistent, downloadable 3D environments rather than generating worlds on-the-fly as you explore. This, the company says, results in less morphing or inconsistency, and lets users export worlds as Gaussian splats, meshes or videos....

item.title: The Physics of the Northern Lights
item.description: The aurora borealis is usually seen near the Arctic, but solar winds and magnetic turbulence are sparking some of the best light shows in centuries throughout the US.

item.title: Les smartphones peuvent maintenant émuler la Nintendo Switch
item.description: L'émulateur Nintendo Switch Citron profite d'une mise à jour lui permettant de tirer le meilleur parti des smartphones Snapdragon 8 Elite.

item.title: Sony lance un moniteur gaming pour la PS5… et le PC
item.description: La prochaine étape pour PlayStation sera-t-elle… un PC gaming ? Après les enceintes sans fil « de bureau », Sony a en effet présenté un moniteur 27 pouces parfaitement adapté à la PS5 (surtout avec son système de recharge pour une manette), mais aussi au PC et au Mac. Hélas, le constructeur n'a pas donné de prix et limite la commercialisation aux États-Unis et au Japon....

item.title: The Coros Pace 3 is better value than almost any Garmin watch you can find – I'd set an alert for the Black Friday deals
item.description: Now that the Coros Pace 4 is out, expect the Pace 3 to drop in price.

item.title: Cdiscount dégaine de belles offres pour le pré-Black Friday : voici les 12 deals à retenir
item.description: Cdiscount a lancé son pré-Black Friday, il y a déjà une semaine, et de nouvelles offres continuent de voir le jour avec des prix particulièrement attractifs. Il y a des réductions sur une large sélection de produits tech, allant des smartphones aux TV en passant par les consoles de jeux. Découvrez les offres les plus intéressantes du moment.

item.title: Galaxy Watch : Samsung passe aussi aux abonnements payants avec de nouveaux entraînements pour ses montres connectées
item.description: Alors que de plus en plus de constructeurs de montres connectées proposent désormais des abonnements payants, Samsung a intégré de nouveaux programmes d'entraînement dans son application Samsung Health, soumis à une souscription.

item.title: Sony's State of Play Japan was filled with indies, remakes, and DLC announcements, but these are the games I'm most excited for
item.description: Sony's State of Play Japan has wrapped. In case you missed it, here are the top five announcements that stood out among a showcase primarily focused on remakes and DLC.

item.title: Who Is Threads For? Meta Would Like One Answer to Be ‘Podcasters’
item.description: Threads is making a concerted effort to woo podcasters.

item.title: Best Home Depot Black Friday Deals for 2025
item.description: Black Friday lasts a month this year at the Home Depot, including half off select tools and tool sets, and deals on Google Nest smart home devices.

item.title: Microsoft-Backed Startup Hits a Milestone in the Race to Power AI
item.description: A demo of the startup’s superconducting cable system promises a more efficient future for energy-hungry data centers.

item.title: Sabrina Carpenter Wants to Bring an ‘Alice in Wonderland’ Movie Musical to Life
item.description: Plus, 'VisionQuest' brings Philomena Cunk herself to the MCU.

item.title: Insta360’s new accessories turn its Ace Pro 2 into an instant camera
item.description: Insta360 has announced new accessories for its 8K Ace Pro 2 action camera. The accessories expand the Ace Pro 2’s capabilities as both a video camera with three new lenses and as a still camera with a redesigned grip and a compact wireless printer that can turn shots into instant photos. They’re launching today as […]

item.title: Microsoft-backed VEIR is bringing superconductors to data centers
item.description: The Massachusetts-based startup is taking tech developed for long distance transmissions lines to solve an emerging problem for data center designers.

item.title: Insta360 just unveiled a bizarre cross between a GoPro and an Instax camera – and it could be the strangest camera setup of 2025
item.description: Insta360 has unveiled new accessories for its flagship action camera, the Ace Pro 2, including a photographer's grip, lenses, and an add-on instant printer

item.title: Boîte de réception | Mettre fin au pourriel, récupérer sa musique et éradiquer un logiciel intempestif
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies. Cette semaine, on essaie de mettre fin au pourriel, on déjoue les limites de la musique en streaming et on désinstalle un logiciel intempestif.

item.title: Black Friday audio : les écouteurs sans fil, casques, barres de son et enceintes montent le volume et baissent leur prix dans ce top des offres
item.description: Apple AirPods, JBL Charge, Marshall, Nothing, Bowers & Wilkins... Les grandes marques de l'audio bradent leurs écouteurs, casques, enceintes, barres de son et autres pendant l'avant-première du Black Friday. Voici notre sélection des meilleures offres !

item.title: Australian spy chief warns Chinese hackers are ‘probing’ critical networks for espionage and sabotage
item.description: Australia's intelligence chief warned that Chinese hackers are trying to break into its networks, sometimes successfully, to "pre-position" for sabotage ahead of an anticipated invasion of Taiwan.

item.title: Samsung’s new 27-inch portable display has a three-hour battery life
item.description: Samsung has launched a new portable display that can be pushed around on a rollable stand or carried like a giant tablet. The $1,199.99 Movingstyle is a 27-inch touchscreen display that features a battery life of up to three hours, allowing you to stream content or show workplace presentations without being tied to a power […]

item.title: What’s Cooler Than Building a Literal God? Building the New Uber
item.description: OpenAI shifts from artificial general intelligence to personalized chatbots for everybody.

item.title: Groww raises nearly $750M in IPO as India’s retail investing boom continues
item.description: The company's shares opened 12% above their issue price, at ₹112, and closed at ₹128.85, lending it a market cap of ₹795 billion (approximately $9 billion).

item.title: A bargain-priced PS5 Digital Edition has been revealed by Sony – but it's going to be exclusive to Japan
item.description: As the PlayStation 5 celebrates five years since launch, Sony has announced a new Japan-exclusive PS5 Digital Edition with a cheaper price tag.

item.title: Is a Robot Vacuum Worth It?
item.description: It’s not for everyone, but sometimes my robot vacuum is my only friend.

item.title: PayPal finally returns to the UK - and relaunches with all-new payment tools and services
item.description: UK customers will be the first to get PayPal+ loyalty points across a range of payment methods.

item.title: « Personne n’en veut » : Microsoft s’attire les foudres des utilisateurs sur l’intégration de l’IA dans Windows 11
item.description: Après avoir évoqué l’évolution de Windows 11 vers un système d’exploitation agentique animé par l’IA, le responsable de la division Windows chez Microsoft a reçu un torrent de réactions négatives de la part des utilisateurs.

item.title: La Switch Lite est à -40 % pour le Singles Day : une console Nintendo plus petite et plus portable, mais beaucoup moins chère
item.description: La Nintendo Switch Lite est une version uniquement portable de la Switch première du nom, à retrouver à 124,14 euros au lieu de 199 euros sur AliExpress, soit près de 40 % de remise sur le prix de base.

item.title: 8 Times Scientists and Inventors Tragically Died for Their Experiments
item.description: Innovation can be deadly.

item.title: This new AirTag rival is disguised as a credit card to throw thieves off its tracking scent
item.description: Nomad’s Tracking Card Pro is an AirTag rival with a clever trick to hide it from thieves.

item.title: Agentic AI isn’t always the answer
item.description: Success will come from using this tool for the right task, at the right time. When it comes to agentic artificial intelligence, the fear of missing out factor is clear. Organizations are plopping down agents, in part, because that’s what everyone else seems to be doing. But FOMO is not a business strategy. To make agentic AI work, business leaders need to ignore the hype and concentrate on establishing exactly what agents can do for them, how, and at what cost....

item.title: ‘Predator: Badlands’ Star Elle Fanning Thinks Genre Movies Are as Award-Worthy as the Rest of Cinema
item.description: Actors in horror, sci-fi, and fantasy films have long been overlooked by the Oscars, with just a few notable exceptions.

item.title: How to Talk to ChatGPT for Free Inside WhatsApp (While You Still Can)
item.description: Meta’s messaging app offers free access to the AI chatbot, but only until January 2026.

item.title: Teradar raises $150M for a sensor it says beats lidar and radar
item.description: Teradar's sensor uses the terahertz part of the electromagnetic spectrum, and combines the best traits of radar and lidar sensors without some of the drawbacks.

item.title: Why Uncommon Goods is your gift-giving secret weapon amid Amazon burnout and tariffs
item.description: For 25 years, Uncommon Goods has focused on hidden e-commerce gems. This year, it might be a way to make your holiday spending more meaningful. The early darkness in most of the U.S. means that fall has set in. That also means it’s officially holiday shopping season. With the economic impact of President Trump’s ever-fluctuating tariffs an open question, there’s an opportunity for shoppers to make their spending meaningful, which opens up a lane for companies that are offering something other than the e-commerce onslaught of nearly identical products that populate sites like Amazon and Walmart...

item.title: This recommerce site is tackling retail’s 8-billion-pound problem—returns—with buy-in from Jay-Z and Serena Williams
item.description: Rebel partners with retailers to sell their returned merchandise. It just raised $25 million led by Jay-Z’s MarcyPen Capital Partners to keep growing. America is in an overstock and returns crisis. Every year 8.4 billion pounds of products are returned to online sellers, according to the National Retail Federation. The typical solution from retailers is to send the roughly 17% of their inventory made up of returns to a landfill, regardless of the condition of the products....

item.title: Vie numérique | Parler toutes les langues du monde
item.description: Quand le PDG de Facebook, Mark Zuckerberg, a annoncé qu’il rebaptisait son entreprise Meta, en octobre 2021, une des choses qu’il a promises grâce à l’émergence de son IA est qu’il serait possible de préserver toutes les langues parlées sur la planète. On est encore loin du compte, mais c’est ce qui guide le développement de la génération de ses lunettes connectées qui vient d’être mise en vente....

item.title: Voici à quoi ressembleront les futures voitures électriques de Peugeot : direction révolutionnaire et nouveau style au programme
item.description: Voici le Peugeot Polygon, annonciateur des futures voitures électriques de la marque. Ce concept met en avant son Hypersquare, ce drôle de volant associé à la direction électronique steer-by-wire… et confirme que la nouvelle Peugeot 208 aura un peu de retard.

item.title: 30 jours avec l’iPhone Air : j’avais tort de le détester autant
item.description: Retour d'expérience après 30 jours avec l'iPhone Air : comment un produit universellement critiqué (moi le premier) peut finalement faire sens.

item.title: Pokémon Pokopia looks adorable. Heres everything to know.
item.description: What can you expect from Pokémon’s first life/farming sim?
